long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Image Templates is an image automation tool that comes with over 140.000 image layouts for social media images and display ads images.

Images are created by filling placeholders in the layout template. The placeholders are tags like [product_name] or [price]. The placeholders may be also images where you can put the product images from your online store, restaurant menu, job offer or a crowd funding action.

Image Templates Chrome extension links the image template with the content of your website, pulls product names and product images that are instantly inserted into the final image.

When do you need Image Templates:
- you want to create 100s of similar images that share the same layout and branding
- your images will differ by tests or other images inside (like your product images)
- you need to build a list of fancy images to publish on social media

Benefits of using Image Templates:
- make 100s of similar images for all products in your online store
- promote new products in your online store on social media
- build a queue of images for posting on Facebook, Instagram, LinkedIn, Twitter by reusing the content of your store or restaurant
- in 5 minutes make 30 images for publishing on social media for a whole month
- make fancy display ads images using the product images from your online store
- create images for ad-hoc events and campaigns like a Black Friday sale

Image Templates features:
- library of 140.000 typical image layouts used in display ads and social media posts
- edit your layouts as PowerPoint presentations
- fill the image layouts with the content captured from your website, that could be the product names and product images from your store
- image generation REST API for advanced users
